material.content: {"text":" يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍۢ وَٰحِدَةٍۢ \nوَخَلَقَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَبَثَّ مِنْهُمَا رِجَالًۭا كَثِيرًۭا وَنِسَآءًۭ ۚ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,165]}]}

{"text":" وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِى تَسَآءَلُونَ بِهِۦ \nوَٱلْأَرْحَامَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَيْكُمْ رَقِيبًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,107]}]}

{"text":"وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلْيَتَٰمَىٰٓ أَمْوَٰلَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تَتَبَدَّلُوا۟ ٱلْخَبِيثَ بِٱلطَّيِّبِ ۖ وَلَا تَأْكُلُوٓا۟ \nأَمْوَٰلَهُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَمْوَٰلِكُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ حُوبًۭا كَبِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,178]}]}

{"text":"وَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا تُقْسِطُوا۟ فِى ٱلْيَتَٰمَىٰ فَٱنكِحُوا۟ مَا طَابَ لَكُم\n مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ مَثْنَىٰ وَثُلَٰثَ وَرُبَٰعَ ۖ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,130]}]}

{"text":"فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا تَعْدِلُوا۟ فَوَٰحِدَةً أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَٰنُكُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدْنَىٰٓ أَلَّا تَعُولُوا۟","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,116]}]}

{"text":"وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلنِّسَآءَ صَدُقَٰتِهِنَّ نِحْلَةًۭ ۚ فَإِن طِبْنَ لَكُمْ عَن شَىْءٍۢ مِّنْهُ \nنَفْسًۭا فَكُلُوهُ هَنِيٓـًۭٔا مَّرِيٓـًۭٔا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,134]}]}

{"text":"وَلَا تُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلسُّفَهَآءَ أَمْوَٰلَكُمُ ٱلَّتِى جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ قِيَٰمًۭا وَٱرْزُقُوهُمْ فِيهَا \nوَٱكْسُوهُمْ وَقُولُوا۟ لَهُمْ قَوْلًۭا مَّعْرُوفًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,159]}]}

{"text":"وَٱبْتَلُوا۟ ٱلْيَتَٰمَىٰ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغُوا۟ ٱلنِّكَاحَ فَإِنْ ءَانَسْتُم مِّنْهُمْ رُشْدًۭا\n فَٱدْفَعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِمْ أَمْوَٰلَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تَأْكُلُوهَآ إِسْرَافًۭا وَبِدَارًا أَن يَكْبَرُوا۟ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,202]}]}

{"text":"وَمَن كَانَ غَنِيًّۭا فَلْيَسْتَعْفِفْ ۖ وَمَن كَانَ فَقِيرًۭا فَلْيَأْكُلْ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۚ\n فَإِذَا دَفَعْتُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ أَمْوَٰلَهُمْ فَأَشْهِدُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,193]}]}

{"text":"لِّلرِّجَالِ نَصِيبٌۭ مِّمَّا تَرَكَ ٱلْوَٰلِدَانِ وَٱلْأَقْرَبُونَ وَلِلنِّسَآءِ نَصِيبٌۭ مِّمَّا\n تَرَكَ ٱلْوَٰلِدَانِ وَٱلْأَقْرَبُونَ مِمَّا قَلَّ مِنْهُ أَوْ كَثُرَ ۚ نَصِيبًۭا مَّفْرُوضًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,195]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَا حَضَرَ ٱلْقِسْمَةَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَٰكِينُ فَٱرْزُقُوهُم مِّنْهُ \nوَقُولُوا۟ لَهُمْ قَوْلًۭا مَّعْرُوفًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,142]}]}

{"text":"وَلْيَخْشَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَوْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّةًۭ ضِعَٰفًا خَافُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ\n فَلْيَتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلْيَقُولُوا۟ قَوْلًۭا سَدِيدًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,149]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَأْكُلُونَ أَمْوَٰلَ ٱلْيَتَٰمَىٰ ظُلْمًا إِنَّمَا يَأْكُلُونَ فِى بُطُونِهِمْ نَارًۭا ۖ\n وَسَيَصْلَوْنَ سَعِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,131]}]}

{"text":"يُوصِيكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِىٓ أَوْلَٰدِكُمْ ۖ لِلذَّكَرِ مِثْلُ حَظِّ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ ۚ فَإِن كُنَّ نِسَآءًۭ \nفَوْقَ ٱثْنَتَيْنِ فَلَهُنَّ ثُلُثَا مَا تَرَكَ ۖ وَإِن كَانَتْ وَٰحِدَةًۭ فَلَهَا ٱلنِّصْفُ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,199]}]}

{"text":"وَلِأَبَوَيْهِ لِكُلِّ وَٰحِدٍۢ مِّنْهُمَا ٱلسُّدُسُ مِمَّا تَرَكَ إِن كَانَ لَهُۥ وَلَدٌۭ ۚ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ وَلَدٌۭ وَوَرِثَهُۥٓ أَبَوَاهُ فَلِأُمِّهِ ٱلثُّلُثُ ۚ فَإِن كَانَ لَهُۥٓ إِخْوَةٌۭ فَلِأُمِّهِ ٱلسُّدُسُ ۚ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,225]}]}

{"text":" مِنۢ بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍۢ يُوصِى بِهَآ أَوْ دَيْنٍ ۗ ءَابَآؤُكُمْ وَأَبْنَآؤُكُمْ لَا تَدْرُونَ أَيُّهُمْ أَقْرَبُ لَكُمْ نَفْعًۭا ۚ فَرِيضَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,200]}]}

{"text":" وَلَكُمْ نِصْفُ مَا تَرَكَ أَزْوَٰجُكُمْ إِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّهُنَّ وَلَدٌۭ ۚ فَإِن\n كَانَ لَهُنَّ وَلَدٌۭ فَلَكُمُ ٱلرُّبُعُ مِمَّا تَرَكْنَ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,143]}]}

{"text":"مِنۢ بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍۢ يُوصِينَ بِهَآ أَوْ دَيْنٍۢ ۚ وَلَهُنَّ ٱلرُّبُعُ مِمَّا تَرَكْتُمْ إِن لَّمْ يَكُن \nلَّكُمْ وَلَدٌۭ ۚ فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ وَلَدٌۭ فَلَهُنَّ ٱلثُّمُنُ مِمَّا تَرَكْتُم ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,193]}]}

{"text":"مِّنۢ بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍۢ تُوصُونَ بِهَآ أَوْ دَيْنٍۢ ۗ وَإِن كَانَ رَجُلٌۭ يُورَثُ كَلَٰلَةً أَوِ ٱمْرَأَةٌۭ\n وَلَهُۥٓ أَخٌ أَوْ أُخْتٌۭ فَلِكُلِّ وَٰحِدٍۢ مِّنْهُمَا ٱلسُّدُسُ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,179]}]}

{"text":"فَإِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَكْثَرَ مِن ذَٰلِكَ فَهُمْ شُرَكَآءُ فِى ٱلثُّلُثِ ۚ مِنۢ بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍۢ يُوصَىٰ بِهَآ\n أَوْ دَيْنٍ غَيْرَ مُضَآرٍّۢ ۚ وَصِيَّةًۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٌۭ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,196]}]}

{"text":"تِلْكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن \nتَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,166]}]}

{"text":"وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَهُۥ يُدْخِلْهُ نَارًا \nخَٰلِدًۭا فِيهَا وَلَهُۥ عَذَابٌۭ مُّهِينٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,119]}]}

{"text":"وَٱلَّٰتِى يَأْتِينَ ٱلْفَٰحِشَةَ مِن نِّسَآئِكُمْ فَٱسْتَشْهِدُوا۟ عَلَيْهِنَّ أَرْبَعَةًۭ مِّنكُمْ ۖ فَإِن \nشَهِدُوا۟ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ فِى ٱلْبُيُوتِ حَتَّىٰ يَتَوَفَّىٰهُنَّ ٱلْمَوْتُ أَوْ يَجْعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُنَّ سَبِيلًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,227]}]}

{"text":"وَٱلَّذَانِ يَأْتِيَٰنِهَا مِنكُمْ فَـَٔاذُوهُمَا ۖ فَإِن تَابَا وَأَصْلَحَا فَأَعْرِضُوا۟ عَنْهُمَآ ۗ \nإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ تَوَّابًۭا رَّحِيمًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,145]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّمَا ٱلتَّوْبَةُ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ لِلَّذِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ ٱلسُّوٓءَ بِجَهَٰلَةٍۢ ثُمَّ يَتُوبُونَ مِن\n قَرِيبٍۢ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,190]}]}

{"text":"وَلَيْسَتِ ٱلتَّوْبَةُ لِلَّذِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ إِنِّى تُبْتُ ٱلْـَٰٔنَ وَلَا ٱلَّذِينَ يَمُوتُونَ وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,229]}]}

{"text":"يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَرِثُوا۟ ٱلنِّسَآءَ كَرْهًۭا ۖ وَلَا تَعْضُلُوهُنَّ \nلِتَذْهَبُوا۟ بِبَعْضِ مَآ ءَاتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ إِلَّآ أَن يَأْتِينَ بِفَٰحِشَةٍۢ مُّبَيِّنَةٍۢ ۚ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,208]}]}

{"text":" وَعَاشِرُوهُنَّ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۚ فَإِن كَرِهْتُمُوهُنَّ \nفَعَسَىٰٓ أَن تَكْرَهُوا۟ شَيْـًۭٔا وَيَجْعَلَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِ خَيْرًۭا كَثِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,137]}]}

{"text":"وَإِنْ أَرَدتُّمُ ٱسْتِبْدَالَ زَوْجٍۢ مَّكَانَ زَوْجٍۢ وَءَاتَيْتُمْ إِحْدَىٰهُنَّ قِنطَارًۭا \nفَلَا تَأْخُذُوا۟ مِنْهُ شَيْـًٔا ۚ أَتَأْخُذُونَهُۥ بُهْتَٰنًۭا وَإِثْمًۭا مُّبِينًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,182]}]}

{"text":"وَكَيْفَ تَأْخُذُونَهُۥ وَقَدْ أَفْضَىٰ بَعْضُكُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ وَأَخَذْنَ مِنكُم مِّيثَٰقًا غَلِيظًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,104]}]}

{"text":"وَلَا تَنكِحُوا۟ مَا نَكَحَ ءَابَآؤُكُم مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِلَّا مَا قَدْ سَلَفَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ \nكَانَ فَٰحِشَةًۭ وَمَقْتًۭا وَسَآءَ سَبِيلًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,139]}]}

{"text":"حُرِّمَتْ عَلَيْكُمْ أُمَّهَٰتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُكُمْ وَأَخَوَٰتُكُمْ وَعَمَّٰتُكُمْ \nوَخَٰلَٰتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُ ٱلْأَخِ وَبَنَاتُ ٱلْأُخْتِ وَأُمَّهَٰتُكُمُ ٱلَّٰتِىٓ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,161]}]}

{"text":" أَرْضَعْنَكُمْ وَأَخَوَٰتُكُم مِّنَ ٱلرَّضَٰعَةِ وَأُمَّهَٰتُ نِسَآئِكُمْ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,76]}]}

{"text":"وَرَبَٰٓئِبُكُمُ ٱلَّٰتِى فِى حُجُورِكُم مِّن نِّسَآئِكُمُ ٱلَّٰتِى دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ \nفَإِن لَّمْ تَكُونُوا۟ دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,154]}]}

{"text":"وَحَلَٰٓئِلُ أَبْنَآئِكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِنْ أَصْلَٰبِكُمْ وَأَن تَجْمَعُوا۟ بَيْنَ \nٱلْأُخْتَيْنِ إِلَّا مَا قَدْ سَلَفَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,162]}]}

{"text":" وَٱلْمُحْصَنَٰتُ مِنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِلَّا مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَٰنُكُمْ ۖ كِتَٰبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ\n وَأُحِلَّ لَكُم مَّا وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَن تَبْتَغُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِكُم مُّحْصِنِينَ غَيْرَ مُسَٰفِحِينَ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,207]}]}

{"text":"فَمَا ٱسْتَمْتَعْتُم بِهِۦ مِنْهُنَّ فَـَٔاتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةًۭ ۚ وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ \nفِيمَا تَرَٰضَيْتُم بِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱلْفَرِيضَةِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,195]}]}

{"text":"وَمَن لَّمْ يَسْتَطِعْ مِنكُمْ طَوْلًا أَن يَنكِحَ ٱلْمُحْصَنَٰتِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ \nفَمِن مَّا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَٰنُكُم مِّن فَتَيَٰتِكُمُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,151]}]}

{"text":"وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِإِيمَٰنِكُم ۚ بَعْضُكُم مِّنۢ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ فَٱنكِحُوهُنَّ بِإِذْنِ أَهْلِهِنَّ \nوَءَاتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ مُحْصَنَٰتٍ غَيْرَ مُسَٰفِحَٰتٍۢ وَلَا مُتَّخِذَٰتِ أَخْدَانٍۢ ۚ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,204]}]}

{"text":" فَإِذَآ أُحْصِنَّ فَإِنْ أَتَيْنَ بِفَٰحِشَةٍۢ فَعَلَيْهِنَّ نِصْفُ مَا عَلَى ٱلْمُحْصَنَٰتِ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ ٱلْعَنَتَ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَأَن تَصْبِرُوا۟ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,219]}]}

{"text":"يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُبَيِّنَ لَكُمْ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ سُنَنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ \nوَيَتُوبَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,132]}]}

{"text":"وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَيُرِيدُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ \nأَن تَمِيلُوا۟ مَيْلًا عَظِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,120]}]}

{"text":"يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَأْكُلُوٓا۟ أَمْوَٰلَكُم بَيْنَكُم بِٱلْبَٰطِلِ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ تِجَٰرَةً عَن تَرَاضٍۢ مِّنكُمْ ۚ وَلَا تَقْتُلُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُمْ رَحِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,210]}]}

{"text":"وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ عُدْوَٰنًۭا وَظُلْمًۭا فَسَوْفَ نُصْلِيهِ نَارًۭا ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,113]}]}

{"text":"إِن تَجْتَنِبُوا۟ كَبَآئِرَ مَا تُنْهَوْنَ عَنْهُ نُكَفِّرْ عَنكُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمْ \nوَنُدْخِلْكُم مُّدْخَلًۭا كَرِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,121]}]}

{"text":"وَلَا تَتَمَنَّوْا۟ مَا فَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ بَعْضَكُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ لِّلرِّجَالِ نَصِيبٌۭ مِّمَّا ٱكْتَسَبُوا۟ ۖ وَلِلنِّسَآءِ نَصِيبٌۭ مِّمَّا ٱكْتَسَبْنَ ۚ وَسْـَٔلُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مِن فَضْلِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,247]}]}

{"text":"وَلِكُلٍّۢ جَعَلْنَا مَوَٰلِىَ مِمَّا تَرَكَ ٱلْوَٰلِدَانِ وَٱلْأَقْرَبُونَ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ عَقَدَتْ أَيْمَٰنُكُمْ \nفَـَٔاتُوهُمْ نَصِيبَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,191]}]}

{"text":"ٱلرِّجَالُ قَوَّٰمُونَ عَلَى ٱلنِّسَآءِ بِمَا فَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ بَعْضَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ وَبِمَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ مِنْ \nأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ ۚ فَٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ قَٰنِتَٰتٌ حَٰفِظَٰتٌۭ لِّلْغَيْبِ بِمَا حَفِظَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,204]}]}

{"text":" وَٱلَّٰتِى تَخَافُونَ نُشُوزَهُنَّ فَعِظُوهُنَّ وَٱهْجُرُوهُنَّ فِى ٱلْمَضَاجِعِ وَٱضْرِبُوهُنَّ ۖ \nفَإِنْ أَطَعْنَكُمْ فَلَا تَبْغُوا۟ عَلَيْهِنَّ سَبِيلًا ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيًّۭا كَبِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,199]}]}

{"text":"وَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ شِقَاقَ بَيْنِهِمَا فَٱبْعَثُوا۟ حَكَمًۭا مِّنْ أَهْلِهِۦ وَحَكَمًۭا مِّنْ أَهْلِهَآ \nإِن يُرِيدَآ إِصْلَٰحًۭا يُوَفِّقِ ٱللَّهُ بَيْنَهُمَآ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا خَبِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,200]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا سَوْفَ نُصْلِيهِمْ نَارًۭا كُلَّمَا نَضِجَتْ جُلُودُهُم \nبَدَّلْنَٰهُمْ جُلُودًا غَيْرَهَا لِيَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,196]}]}

{"text":"وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَنُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ \nخَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ لَّهُمْ فِيهَآ أَزْوَٰجٌۭ مُّطَهَّرَةٌۭ ۖ وَنُدْخِلُهُمْ ظِلًّۭا ظَلِيلًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,214]}]}

{"text":" إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَأْمُرُكُمْ أَن تُؤَدُّوا۟ ٱلْأَمَٰنَٰتِ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهَا وَإِذَا حَكَمْتُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ \nأَن تَحْكُمُوا۟ بِٱلْعَدْلِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ نِعِمَّا يَعِظُكُم بِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,221]}]}

{"text":"يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَمْرِ مِنكُمْ ۖ فَإِن تَنَٰزَ\nعْتُمْ فِى شَىْءٍۢ فَرُدُّوهُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِ إِن كُنتُمْ تُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْءَاخِرِ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,238]}]}

{"text":"ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَحْسَنُ تَأْوِيلًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,37]}]}

{"text":"أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَزْعُمُونَ أَنَّهُمْ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ \nوَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ يُرِيدُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,124]}]}

{"text":" يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَتَحَاكَمُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّٰغُوتِ وَقَدْ أُمِرُوٓا۟ أَن يَكْفُرُوا۟ بِهِۦ\n وَيُرِيدُ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ أَن يُضِلَّهُمْ ضَلَٰلًۢا بَعِيدًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,149]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَعَالَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ رَأَيْتَ ٱلْمُنَٰفِقِينَ \nيَصُدُّونَ عَنكَ صُدُودًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,132]}]}

{"text":"فَكَيْفَ إِذَآ أَصَٰبَتْهُم مُّصِيبَةٌۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ ثُمَّ جَآءُوكَ يَحْلِفُونَ \nبِٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَدْنَآ إِلَّآ إِحْسَٰنًۭا وَتَوْفِيقًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,156]}]}

{"text":"وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا لِيُطَاعَ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ إِذ ظَّلَمُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ جَآءُوكَ فَٱسْتَغْفَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱسْتَغْفَرَ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ لَوَجَدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,221]}]}

{"text":"أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ قِيلَ لَهُمْ كُفُّوٓا۟ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَلَمَّا كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقِتَالُ إِذَا فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ يَخْشَوْنَ ٱلنَّاسَ كَخَشْيَةِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْ أَشَدَّ خَشْيَةًۭ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,239]}]}

{"text":"وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا لِمَ كَتَبْتَ عَلَيْنَا ٱلْقِتَالَ لَوْلَآ أَخَّرْتَنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ قَرِيبٍۢ ۗ \nقُلْ مَتَٰعُ ٱلدُّنْيَا قَلِيلٌۭ وَٱلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لِّمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰ وَلَا تُظْلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,205]}]}

{"text":"أَيْنَمَا تَكُونُوا۟ يُدْرِككُّمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ وَلَوْ كُنتُمْ فِى بُرُوجٍۢ مُّشَيَّدَةٍۢ ۗ \nوَإِن تُصِبْهُمْ حَسَنَةٌۭ يَقُولُوا۟ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,157]}]}

{"text":"وَإِن تُصِبْهُمْ سَيِّئَةٌۭ يَقُولُوا۟ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنْ عِندِكَ ۚ قُلْ كُلٌّۭ مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ \nفَمَالِ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلْقَوْمِ لَا يَكَادُونَ يَفْقَهُونَ حَدِيثًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,165]}]}

{"text":"مَّآ أَصَابَكَ مِنْ حَسَنَةٍۢ فَمِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَمَآ أَصَابَكَ مِن سَيِّئَةٍۢ فَمِن نَّفْسِكَ ۚ \nوَأَرْسَلْنَٰكَ لِلنَّاسِ رَسُولًۭا ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,165]}]}

{"text":"مَّن يُطِعِ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدْ أَطَاعَ ٱللَّهَ ۖ وَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ فَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَٰكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَفِيظًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,105]}]}

{"text":"وَيَقُولُونَ طَاعَةٌۭ فَإِذَا بَرَزُوا۟ مِنْ عِندِكَ بَيَّتَ طَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى تَقُولُ ۖ \nوَٱللَّهُ يَكْتُبُ مَا يُبَيِّتُونَ ۖ فَأَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,222]}]}

{"text":"أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ ۚ وَلَوْ كَانَ مِنْ عِندِ غَيْرِ ٱللَّهِ لَوَجَدُوا۟ فِيهِ ٱخْتِلَٰفًۭا كَثِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,117]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَا جَآءَهُمْ أَمْرٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْنِ أَوِ ٱلْخَوْفِ أَذَاعُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَوْ رَدُّوهُ إِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ وَإِلَىٰٓ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَمْرِ مِنْهُمْ لَعَلِمَهُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَنۢبِطُونَهُۥ مِنْهُمْ ۗ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,198]}]}

{"text":"وَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهُۥ لَٱتَّبَعْتُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,94]}]}

{"text":"مَّن يَشْفَعْ شَفَٰعَةً حَسَنَةًۭ يَكُن لَّهُۥ نَصِيبٌۭ مِّنْهَا ۖ وَمَن يَشْفَعْ شَفَٰعَةًۭ \nسَيِّئَةًۭ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كِفْلٌۭ مِّنْهَا ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ مُّقِيتًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,184]}]}

{"text":"كَذَٰلِكَ كُنتُم مِّن قَبْلُ فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْكُمْ فَتَبَيَّنُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,121]}]}

{"text":"لَّا يَسْتَوِى ٱلْقَٰعِدُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ غَيْرُ أُو۟لِى ٱلضَّرَرِ وَٱلْمُجَٰهِدُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ فَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُجَٰهِدِينَ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ عَلَى ٱلْقَٰعِدِينَ دَرَجَةًۭ ۚ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,237]}]}

{"text":"قَالُوٓا۟ أَلَمْ تَكُنْ أَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةًۭ فَتُهَاجِرُوا۟ فِيهَا ۚ \nفَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ مَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَسَآءَتْ مَصِيرًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,134]}]}

{"text":"إِلَّا ٱلْمُسْتَضْعَفِينَ مِنَ ٱلرِّجَالِ وَٱلنِّسَآءِ وَٱلْوِلْدَٰنِ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ حِيلَةًۭ وَلَا يَهْتَدُونَ سَبِيلًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,126]}]}

{"text":" وَمَن يُهَاجِرْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يَجِدْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُرَٰغَمًۭا كَثِيرًۭا وَسَعَةًۭ ۚ وَمَن\n يَخْرُجْ مِنۢ بَيْتِهِۦ مُهَاجِرًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ثُمَّ يُدْرِكْهُ ٱلْمَوْتُ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,187]}]}

{"text":"ثُمَّ يُدْرِكْهُ ٱلْمَوْتُ فَقَدْ وَقَعَ أَجْرُهُۥ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,103]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَا ضَرَبْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَقْصُرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ إِنْ \nخِفْتُمْ أَن يَفْتِنَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ كَانُوا۟ لَكُمْ عَدُوًّۭا مُّبِينًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,205]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَا كُنتَ فِيهِمْ فَأَقَمْتَ لَهُمُ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ فَلْتَقُمْ طَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنْهُم مَّعَكَ وَلْيَأْخُذُوٓا۟ \nأَسْلِحَتَهُمْ فَإِذَا سَجَدُوا۟ فَلْيَكُونُوا۟ مِن وَرَآئِكُمْ وَلْتَأْتِ طَآئِفَةٌ أُخْرَىٰ لَمْ يُصَلُّوا۟ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,222]}]}

{"text":" وَلْتَأْتِ طَآئِفَةٌ أُخْرَىٰ لَمْ يُصَلُّوا۟ فَلْيُصَلُّوا۟ مَعَكَ وَلْيَأْخُذُوا۟ حِذْرَهُمْ وَأَسْلِحَتَهُمْ ۗ \nوَدَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْ تَغْفُلُونَ عَنْ أَسْلِحَتِكُمْ وَأَمْتِعَتِكُمْ فَيَمِيلُونَ عَلَيْكُم","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,219]}]}

{"text":" مَّيْلَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ ۚ وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِن كَانَ بِكُمْ أَذًۭى مِّن مَّطَرٍ أَوْ كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰٓ أَن تَضَعُوٓا۟ أَسْلِحَتَكُمْ ۖ وَخُذُوا۟ حِذْرَكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلْكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًۭا مُّهِينًۭا ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,223]}]}

{"text":"فَإِذَا قَضَيْتُمُ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ فَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قِيَٰمًۭا وَقُعُودًۭا وَعَلَىٰ جُنُوبِكُمْ ۚ فَإِذَا ٱطْمَأْنَنتُمْ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ كَانَتْ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ كِتَٰبًۭا مَّوْقُوتًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,216]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ لِتَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِمَآ أَرَىٰكَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ \nوَلَا تَكُن لِّلْخَآئِنِينَ خَصِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,143]}]}

{"text":"وَٱسْتَغْفِرِ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,64]}]}

{"text":"يَسْتَخْفُونَ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَا يَسْتَخْفُونَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ مَعَهُمْ إِذْ يُبَيِّتُونَ \nمَا لَا يَرْضَىٰ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ مُحِيطًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,172]}]}

{"text":"وَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكَ وَرَحْمَتُهُۥ لَهَمَّت طَّآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُضِلُّوكَ \nوَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ ۖ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,135]}]}

{"text":"وَمَا يَضُرُّونَكَ مِن شَىْءٍۢ ۚ وَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ \nوَعَلَّمَكَ مَا لَمْ تَكُن تَعْلَمُ ۚ وَكَانَ فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكَ عَظِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,165]}]}

{"text":" لَّا خَيْرَ فِى كَثِيرٍۢ مِّن نَّجْوَىٰهُمْ إِلَّا مَنْ أَمَرَ بِصَدَقَةٍ أَوْ مَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ إِصْلَٰحٍۭ \nبَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ ٱبْتِغَآءَ مَرْضَاتِ ٱللَّهِ فَسَوْفَ نُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,214]}]}

{"text":"وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ ٱلْهُدَىٰ وَيَتَّبِعْ غَيْرَ سَبِيلِ\n  ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ نُوَلِّهِۦ مَا تَوَلَّىٰ وَنُصْلِهِۦ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَسَآءَتْ مَصِيرًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,180]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَغْفِرُ أَن يُشْرَكَ بِهِۦ وَيَغْفِرُ مَا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ ۚ \nوَمَن يُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ ضَلَٰلًۢا بَعِيدًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,149]}]}

{"text":"إِن يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ إِنَٰثًۭا وَإِن يَدْعُونَ إِلَّا شَيْطَٰنًۭا مَّرِيدًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,91]}]}

{"text":"لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُ ۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبًۭا مَّفْرُوضًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,80]}]}

{"text":"وَلَأُضِلَّنَّهُمْ وَلَأُمَنِّيَنَّهُمْ وَلَءَامُرَنَّهُمْ فَلَيُبَتِّكُنَّ ءَاذَانَ ٱلْأَنْعَٰمِ وَلَءَامُرَنَّهُمْ فَلَيُغَيِّرُنَّ خَلْقَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّخِذِ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ وَلِيًّۭا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ خَسِرَ خُسْرَانًۭا مُّبِينًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,245]}]}

{"text":"يَعِدُهُمْ وَيُمَنِّيهِمْ ۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,73]}]}

{"text":"أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ مَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنْهَا مَحِيصًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,69]}]}

{"text":"وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَنُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ \nخَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّۭا ۚ وَمَنْ أَصْدَقُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ قِيلًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,201]}]}

{"text":"لَّيْسَ بِأَمَانِيِّكُمْ وَلَآ أَمَانِىِّ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ ۗ مَن يَعْمَلْ سُوٓءًۭا يُجْزَ بِهِۦ \nوَلَا يَجِدْ لَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيًّۭا وَلَا نَصِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,161]}]}

{"text":"وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌۭ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ \nيَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ نَقِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,141]}]}

{"text":"وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ مُّحِيطًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,96]}]}

{"text":"وَإِن مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ إِلَّا لَيُؤْمِنَنَّ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ مَوْتِهِۦ ۖ \nوَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ يَكُونُ عَلَيْهِمْ شَهِيدًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,127]}]}

{"text":"فَبِظُلْمٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ حَرَّمْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ طَيِّبَٰتٍ أُحِلَّتْ لَهُمْ \nوَبِصَدِّهِمْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ كَثِيرًۭا","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,0.83529412746429443,0.60000002384185791]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,131]}]}

{"text":"2. Va yetimlarga o`z mollarini bering. \nNopokni pokka almashtirmang. Ularning \nmollarini o`zingizning mollaringizga qo`shib yemang. Zero, bu katta gunoh bo`lur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,160]}]}

{"text":"3. Agar yetimlarga adolat qila olmaslikdan \nqo`rqsangiz, o`zingizga yoqqan ayollardan ikkitami, uchtami, to`rttami nikohlab oling. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,131]}]}

{"text":"Agar adolat qila olmaslikdan 
qo`rqsangiz, bittani (oling) yoki qo`lingizda 
mulk bo`lganlar bilan (kifoyalaning). 
Mana shu, jabr qilmasligingizga yaqinroqdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,160]}]}

{"text":"4. Ayollarga mahrlarini ko`ngildan chiqarib bering. Agar ular undan biror narsani chin ko`ngildan tutsalar, bas, uni yenglar. Osh bo`lsin, ofiyat bo`lsin.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,154]}]}

{"text":"5. Alloh (hayotingizni) turg`izish (vositasi) 
qilgan mollaringizni esi pastlarga bermang. 
Ularni o`sha mollardan rizqlantiring, 
kiyintiring va ularga yaxshi so`zlar ayting.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,175]}]}

{"text":"6. Yetimlarni to nikoh(yoshi)ga yetgunlaricha sinab turinglar. Agar ularning es-hushi joyida ekanini bilsangiz, ularga o`z mollarini topshiring. \nU mollarni isrof ila va egalarining katta bo`lib qolishidan qo`rqib shoshilib yemang. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,232]}]}

{"text":"Boy bo`lganlar iffatli bo`lsinlar. \nKim kambag`al bo`lsa, to`g`rilik bilan yesin. Ularga o`z mollarini topshirayotganingizda guvohlar keltiring. Hisobchilikka Allohning O`zi kifoya qilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,187]}]}

{"text":"7. Ota-onalar va qarindoshlar qoldirgan narsada erkaklarning nasibasi bor. Ota-onalar va qarindoshlar qoldirgan narsada ayollarning nasibasi bor. \nU oz bo`lsin, ko`p bo`lsin — farz qilingan nasibadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,200]}]}

{"text":"8. Agar taqsimlashga qarindoshlar, yetimlar va miskinlar hozir bo`lsalar, ularni u(meros)dan rizqlantiringlar hamda ularga yaxshi gaplar aytinglar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,147]}]}

{"text":"9. O`zlari zaifhol zurriyotlarini ortdan qoldirishdan qanday qo`rqsalar, (boshqalar haqida ham) shunday qo`rqsinlar. Bas, Allohdan qo`rqsinlar va to`g`ri so`z aytsinlar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,169]}]}

{"text":"10. Albatta, yetimlarning molini zulm ila \nyeganlar qorinlarida olovni yegan bo`lurlar. \nVa, shubhasiz, do`zaxga kirurlar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,122]}]}

{"text":"11. Alloh sizga farzandlaringiz haqida vasiyat etib, \nbir o`g`ilga ikki qiz nasibasicha berishni amr etadi. \nAgar ular ikkitadan ko`p (ayol) bo`lsalar, ularga u (ota) qoldirganning uchdan ikkisi. Agar qiz bitta bo`lsa, unga yarmi. Agar u(mayyit)ning bolasi bo`lsa, u tark qilgan narsadan ota-onasining har biriga oltidan bir. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,326]}]}

{"text":"Agar uning bolasi bo`lmasa va ota-onasi 
merosxo`r bo`lsa, onasiga uchdan bir. Agar uning 
aka-ukalari bo`lsa, onasiga oltidan bir. U qilgan 
vasiyat yoki qarzini ado etgandan so`ng. Otalaringiz 
va bolalaringizdan qaysi birlari sizga manfaatliroq 
ekanini bilmassizlar. Bu, Alloh joriy qilgan farzdir. 
Albatta, Alloh biluvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,347]}]}

{"text":"12. Sizlarga xotinlaringiz qoldirgan narsaning \n— agar ularning bolasi bo`lmasa — yarmi tegadi. \nAgar ularning bolasi bo`lsa, sizga ular qoldirgan narsaning choragi tegadi. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,173]}]}

{"text":"Ular qilgan vasiyatni yoki qarzlarini ado etgandan \nso`ng. Ularga siz qoldirgan narsaning — agar bolangiz bo`lmasa — choragi tegadi. Agar bolangiz bo`lsa, ularga siz qoldirgan narsaning sakkizdan biri tegadi. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,209]}]}

{"text":"Siz qilgan vasiyatni yoki qarzingizni ado etgandan \nso`ng. Agar bir erkak yoki ayol kalola holida meros qoldirsa, uning birodari yoki singlisi bo`lsa, \nulardan har biriga oltidan bir tegur. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,190]}]}

{"text":"Agar ular bundan ko`p bo`lsalar, uchdan biriga sherikdirlar. Zarar qilmaydigan vasiyatni yoki qarzni ado etgandan so`ng. Bular Allohning vasiyatidir. \nVa Alloh biluvchi hamda Haliym Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,189]}]}

{"text":"13. Ana o`shalar Allohning chegaralaridir. \nKim Allohga va Uning Rasuliga itoat etsa, \nU Zot uni ostidan anhorlar oqib turgan jannatga abadiy qolish uchun kiritadir. Bu esa, ulkan yutuqdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,189]}]}

{"text":"14. Kim Allohga va Uning Rasuliga isyon qilsa 
va Uning chegarasidan tajovuz qilsa, 
U Zot uni abadiy qolish uchun do`zaxga kiritadir. 
Va unga xorlovchi azob bordir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,166]}]}

{"text":"15. Ayollaringizdan fohisha (zino) qilganlariga \no`zlaringizdan to`rtta guvoh keltiring. Agar guvohlik bersalar, ularni to o`lim yetguncha yoki Alloh bir \nyo`l ko`rsatguncha uylarida tutib turing.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,196]}]}

{"text":"16. Sizlardan o`sha(fohisha) ishni qilgan 
ikki erkakka ozor beringlar. Agar ikkovlari tavba 
qilsalar va tuzalsalar, ularni tek qo`ying. Albatta, 
Alloh tavbalarni qabul qiluvchi va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,198]}]}

{"text":"17. Jaholat-la yomonlik qilib qo`yib, 
so`ngra tezda tavba qiladiganlarning 
tavbasi Allohning zimmasidadir. 
Alloh ana o`shalarning tavbasini qabul qiladir. 
Va Alloh biluvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,196]}]}

{"text":"18. Yomonliklarni qilib yurib, birlariga o`lim yetganda, endi tavba qildim, deganlarga va kofir hollarida \no`lganlarga tavba yo`q. Ana o`shalarga alamli azoblarni tayyorlab qo`yganmiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,184]}]}

{"text":"19. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Sizlarga ayollarni zulm-la merosga olish halol emas. Ochiq fohisha ish qilmasalar, bergan narsalaringizning ba'zisini olish uchun ularni zo`rlik-la ushlab turmang va ular ila yaxshilikda yashang. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,224]}]}

{"text":"Agar ularni yoqtirmasangiz, shoyadki, Alloh siz yoqtirmagan narsada ko`pgina yaxshiliklarni qilsa.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,98]}]}

{"text":"20. Va agar xotin o`rniga boshqa xotin olmoqchi
 bo`lsangiz va ularning biriga haddan ziyod mahr bergan bo`lsangiz ham, undan hech narsani 
qaytarib olmang. Uni bo`hton va katta gunoh 
holida olaverasizmi?","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,205]}]}

{"text":"21. Va qanday ham olursiz?! \nAxir, bir-biringizga qovushdingiz va ular sizdan mustahkam ahdu paymon olganlar-ku?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,113]}]}

{"text":"22. Otalaringiz o`z nikohlariga olgan ayollarni \nsiz o`z nikohingizga olmang! Avval o`tgan bo`lsa, mayli. Bu ish, albatta, fohisha, g`azabnok ish va qanday ham yomon yo`ldir!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,174]}]}

{"text":"23. Sizlarga onalaringiz, qizlaringiz, opa-singillaringiz, ammalaringiz, xolalaringiz, aka-ukalaringizning qizlari, opa-singillaringizning qizlari, emizgan onalaringiz, emikdosh opa-singillaringiz, xotinlaringizning onalari, \no`zingiz qovushgan xotinlaringizning \nqaramog`ingizdagi qizlari harom qilindi. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,305]}]}

{"text":"Agar u(xotin)lar bilan qovushmagan bo`lsangiz, 
(qizlariga uylanishingizda) gunoh yo`q. 
Va pushtingizdan bo`lgan o`g`illaringizning xotinlari, 
opa-singilni qo`shib olmog`ingiz harom qilindi. 
Magar avval o`tgan bo`lsa, mayli. Albatta, 
Alloh mag`firat qiluvchi va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,281]}]}

{"text":"24. Qo`lingizga mulk bo`lib tushganlardan boshqa \nerli ayollar ham (harom qilindi). Bu sizlarga Allohning yozganidir. Ana o`shalardan boshqalarni poklik va \nzino aralashtirmagan holda mollaringiz ila talab qilmog`ingiz halol qilindi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,233]}]}

{"text":" Ulardan huzurlanishingiz sababidan mahrlarini bering. Bu farzdir. Farz mahrdan keyin o`zaro rozilik ila kelishganingiz gunoh emas. Albatta, Alloh biluvchi \nva hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,176]}]}

{"text":"25. Sizlardan kim hur mo`minalarni nikohiga olishga imkon topmasa, qo`lingizda mulk bo`lgan mo`mina qizlaringizdan (uylansin). ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,127]}]}

{"text":"Alloh iymoningizni biluvchi Zotdir. \nHammalaringiz birsiz. Ularni nikohingizga ahllarining izni ila oling. Va yaxshilik bilan mahrlarini bering. Ular pokiza, zinokor emas va o`ynash tutmagan bo`lsinlar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,203]}]}

{"text":"Erga tekkanlaridan so`ng fohisha ish qilsalar, ularga hur ayollarga beriladigan azobning yarmi beriladir. \nBu buzilishdan qo`rqqanlar uchundir. Sabr qilmog`ingiz siz uchun yaxshidir. Alloh mag`firatli va rahimlidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,215]}]}

{"text":"26. Alloh sizlarga bayon qilib berishni, \nsizni oldingilarning yo`liga hidoyat qilishni va tavbalaringizni qabul etishni xohlaydir. \nAlloh biluvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,167]}]}

{"text":"27. Alloh sizning tavbangizni qabul qilishni xohlaydir. Shahvatlarga ergashadiganlar esa, ulkan og`ishga moyil bo`lishingizni xohlaydir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,136]}]}

{"text":"28. Alloh sizdan yengillatmoqni xohlaydir. \nVa inson zaif yaratilgandir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,72]}]}

{"text":"29. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Bir-birlaringizning mollaringizni botil yo`l bilan yemang. Magar o`zaro rozilik ila tijorat bo`lsa, mayli. O`zingizni o`zingiz \no`ldirmang. Albatta, Alloh sizlarga rahimlidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,203]}]}

{"text":"30. Kim o`shani tajovuzkorlik va zulm ila qilsa, albatta, uni do`zaxga kiriturmiz. Bu esa, Allohga osondir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,107]}]}

{"text":"31. Agar qaytarilgan narsalarning kattalaridan \nchetda bo`lsangiz, gunohlaringizni kechirurmiz \nva sizni yaxshi joyga kiritamiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,128]}]}

{"text":"32. Alloh ba'zingizni ba'zingizdan afzal etgan narsalarni (hasad ila) orzu etmang. Erkaklarga o`z kasbidan nasiba bor. Ayollarga o`z kasbidan nasiba bor. Allohdan fazlini so`rang. Albatta, \nAlloh har bir narsani biluvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,228]}]}

{"text":"33. Ota-ona va qarindoshlar qoldirgan narsaga 
har bir kishi uchun merosxo`rlar qildik. Qasamingiz 
ila bog`langanlarga nasibasini bering. Albatta, 
Alloh har bir narsaga shohiddir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,181]}]}

{"text":"34. Alloh ba'zilarini ba'zilaridan ustun qilgani va mollaridan sarflaganlari uchun erkaklar ayollarga rahbardirlar. Soliha ayollar — itoatkor va Allohning \nhifzi-himoyasi bo`yicha g`oyib (er)larining muhofazasini qiluvchilardir. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,229]}]}

{"text":"Bosh ko`tarishlaridan xavf qilingan ayollarga va'z-nasihat qiling, yotoqlarida hijron qiling va uring. Agar itoat qilsalar, ularga qarshi boshqa yo`l axtarmang. Albatta, Alloh yuksak maqomli buyuk Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,204]}]}

{"text":"35. Agar ikkovlarining oralari buzilishidan qo`rqsangiz, erning ahlidan bir hakam va xotinning ahlidan bir hakam ajrating. Agar ular islohni iroda qilsalar, \nAlloh er-xotinning orasini muvofiqlashtirur. \nAlbatta, Alloh biluvchi va xabardor Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,247]}]}

{"text":"36. Va Allohga ibodat qilinglar va Unga hech narsani shirk keltirmanglar. Ota-onaga, qarindoshlarga, yetimlarga, miskinlarga, yaqin qo`shnilarga, 
yon qo`shnilarga, yonboshdagi sohiblarga, 
ko`chada qolganlarga va qo`lingizda mulk 
bo`lganlarga yaxshilik qilinglar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,266]}]}

{"text":"Albatta, Alloh o`zini yuqori tutuvchilarni va odamlar ustidan faxr qiluvchilarni xush ko`rmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,94]}]}

{"text":"37. Ular baxillik qiladigan, odamlarni baxillikka buyuradigan va Alloh ularga O`z fazlidan bergan narsalarni berkitadiganlardir. Va kofirlarga xorlovchi azobni tayyorlaganmiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,175]}]}

{"text":"38. Ular mollarini kishilar ko`rishi uchun sarflarlar. Hamda Allohga va qiyomat kuniga iymon keltirmaslar. Kimning yaqini shayton bo`lsa, \nu qanday ham yomon yaqin!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,164]}]}

{"text":"39. Agar Allohga va qiyomat kuniga iymon keltirsalar, Alloh ularga rizq qilib bergan narsadan nafaqa qilsalar, ularga nima zarar bo`ladir? \nAlloh ularni yaxshi biluvchi Zotdir!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,176]}]}

{"text":"40. Albatta, Alloh zarracha ham zulm qilmas. \nAgar yaxshilik bo`lsa, bir necha bor ko`paytirur va \nO`z huzuridan ulug` ajr berur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,129]}]}

{"text":"41. Har bir ummatdan bir guvoh keltirib, \nseni ularning hammasiga guvoh etib keltirgan \nchog`imizda hol qandoq bo`lur?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,119]}]}

{"text":"42. Kufr keltirganlar va Rasulga isyon qilganlar \no`sha kunda yerga qorishib ketishni istarlar va Allohdan hech gapni yashira olmaslar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,135]}]}

{"text":"43. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Mast holingizda — to aytayotgan gapingizni biladigan bo`lmaguningizcha \n— namozga yaqinlashmang va junub holingizda ham, \nto g`usl qilmaguningizcha. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,177]}]}

{"text":"Magar yo`ldan o`tuvchi bo`lsa, mayli. Agar bemor yoki safarda bo`lsangiz yoki sizdan biringiz tahoratxonadan kelsa yoxud ayollarga yaqinlashgan bo`lsangiz-u, \nsuv topa olmasangiz, pokiza tuproq-la tayammum qiling. Bas, yuzingizga va qo`llaringizga mas'h torting. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,263]}]}

{"text":"Albatta, Alloh afv etuvchi va mag`firat qiluvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,56]}]}

{"text":"44. Kitobdan nasiba berilganlarning zalolatni sotib olishlarini va siz yo`ldan adashishingizni istashlarini \nko`rmaysizmi?","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,122]}]}

{"text":"45. Alloh sizning dushmanlaringizni biluvchi Zotdir. Valiylikka Allohning O`zi kifoya qilur. \nNusrat beruvchilikka Allohning O`zi kifoya qilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,143]}]}

{"text":"46. Yahudiy bo`lganlardan kalimalarni o`z joyidan buzib o`zgartiruvchilar bor. Ular tillarini burib va \ndinga ta'na yetkazib: «Eshitdik va isyon qildik, eshit, \neshitmay qolgur va «Roina» derlar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,196]}]}

{"text":"Agar ular, eshitdik, va itoat qildik, eshit va bizga nazar sol, deganlarida, albatta, o`zlariga yaxshi va to`g`ri \nbo`lar edi. Lekin Alloh ularni kufrlari sababli la'natladi. Bas, ozginalaridan boshqalari iymon keltirmaslar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,224]}]}

{"text":"47. Ey, kitob berilganlar! \nYuzlarni buzib, orqalariga burmasimizdan yoxud ularni shanba odamlarini la'natlaganimizdek \nla'natlamasimizdan oldin, sizlardagi narsani tasdiqlovchi bo`lib kelgan narsaga iymon keltiring. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,217]}]}

{"text":"Allohning ishi amalga oshgusidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,33]}]}

{"text":"48. Albatta, Alloh O`ziga shirk keltirilishini kechirmas. Undan boshqa gunohni, kimni xohlasa, kechiradir. \nKim Allohga shirk keltirsa, shubhasiz, \nkatta gunohni to`qibdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,172]}]}

{"text":"49. O`zlarini pok qilib ko`rsatayotganlarni \nko`rmaysanmi?! Yo`q! Alloh kimni xohlasa, \nshuni poklaydir. Va qilcha zulm qilinmaslar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,132]}]}

{"text":"50. Ularning Allohga yolg`on to`qishini ko`rmaysanmi?! Shuning o`zi ham ochiq-oydin gunohlikka yetarlidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,106]}]}

{"text":"51. Kitobdan nasibador bo`lganlarning botilga va \ntog`utga iymon keltirishlarini va kufr keltirganlarni \n(ko`rsatib): «Anavilar, iymon keltirganlardan ko`ra hidoyatliroq yo`ldalar», deyishlarini ko`rmaysanmi?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,209]}]}

{"text":"52. Ana o`shalarni Alloh la'natlagandir. Kimni Alloh \nla'natlasa, unga hech nusratchi topolmassan.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,98]}]}

{"text":"53. Yoki ular mulkdan nasibadorlar-u, \nshunday taqdirda undan odamlarga \nzig`ircha ham bermaslarmi?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,100]}]}

{"text":"54. Yoki Alloh odamlarga O`z fazlidan bergan narsalarga hasad qilmoqdalarmi? \nBatahqiq, Ibrohim oilasiga kitobni, \nhikmatni va ulug` mulkni berganmiz-ku?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,154]}]}

{"text":"55. Bas, ularning ichida u(Muhammad)ga iymon keltirganlar ham bor, undan yuz o`girib kufr keltirganlar ham bor.
