Jahannam kuydirish azobiga kifoya qilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,152]}]}

{"text":"56. Oyatlarimizga kufr keltirganlarni, albatta, \ndo`zaxga kiritarmiz. Qachonki, terilari yetib pishganda, azobni tortishlari uchun boshqa teri almashtirarmiz. Albatta, Alloh Aziyz va Hakiym Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,197]}]}

{"text":"57. Iymon keltirgan va solih amallarni qilganlarni, albatta, ostidan anhorlar oqib turgan jannatlarga kiritarmiz. Unda abadiy, boqiy qolurlar. Unda ularga pokiza juftlar bor. Va ularni quyuq soyalarga kiritarmiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,212]}]}

{"text":"58. Albatta, Alloh sizlarga omonatlarni 
o`z ahliga erishtirishni va agar odamlar orasida 
hukm qilsangiz, adolat ila hukm qilishni amr qilur. 
Alloh sizlarga qanday ham yaxshi va'z qilur! 
Albatta, Alloh eshituvchi va ko`ruvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,236]}]}

{"text":"59. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Allohga itoat qiling, \nPayg`ambarga va o`zingizdan bo`lgan ishboshilarga itoat qiling. Biror narsa haqida tortishib qolsangiz, \nagar Alloh va oxirat kuniga iymon keltirgan bo`lsangiz, uni Allohga va Payg`ambarga qaytaring.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,250]}]}

{"text":" Ana shunday qilish xayrli va oqibati yaxshidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,48]}]}

{"text":"60. Senga nozil bo`lgan narsaga va sendan oldin \nnozil bo`lgan narsaga iymon keltirganlarini da'vo qilayotganlarni ko`rmaysanmi?! ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,130]}]}

{"text":"Tog`utdan hukm so`rab borishni istarlar. \nHolbuki, unga kufr keltirishga buyurilganlar. Shayton esa, ularni yo`ldan butunlay adashtirishni istaydir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,148]}]}

{"text":"61. Agar ularga: «Alloh nozil qilgan narsaga va \nPayg`ambar huzuriga kelinglar», deyilsa, munofiqlar sendan tamoman yuz o`girganlarini ko`rursan.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,145]}]}

{"text":"62. Endi, qilgan narsalari tufayli ularga musiybat yetgandan so`ng, senga kelib, Alloh ila qasam ichib: \n«Biz faqat yaxshilik va tavfiqni xohlagan edik», deyishlari qanday bo`ldi?","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,179]}]}

{"text":"63. Ana o`shalarning qalblaridagini Alloh biladir. \nBas, ularning qilganidan yuz o`gir! Ularga va'z qil! \nYolg`iz o`zlariga yetkazib so`zla!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,140]}]}

{"text":"64. Qaysi bir Payg`ambarni yuborgan bo`lsak, Allohning izni ila faqat itoat qilinishi uchun yuborganmiz. Agar ular o`zlariga o`zlari zulm qilgan chog`larida huzuringga kelib, ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,175]}]}

{"text":"Allohga istig`for aytganlarida va Payg`ambar ham 
ular uchun istig`for aytganida edi, albatta, 
Alloh tavbalarni qabul etuvchi va rahimli 
Zot ekanini topgan bo`lur edilar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,172]}]}

{"text":"65. Yo`q, Robbingga qasamki, seni o`z oralarida chiqqan kelishmovchiliklarga hakam qilmagunlaricha, keyin, chiqargan hukmingga dillarida tanglik topmasdan, butunlay taslim bo`lmagunlaricha, \nzinhor mo`min bo`la olmaslar!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,220]}]}

{"text":"66. Agar Biz ularga, o`zlaringizni o`ldiring yoki o`zingizni diyorlaringizdan chiqaring, deb farz qilganimizda, ozginalaridan boshqasi buni qilmas edilar. Ular \no`zlariga va'z qilingan narsalarni qilganlarida edi, \no`zlariga yaxshi va sabotlari mustahkam bo`lar edi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,266]}]}

{"text":"67. U holda, Biz ham ularga O`z huzurimizdan \nulug` ajr bergan bo`lur edik.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,75]}]}

{"text":"68. Va ularni to`g`ri yo`lga hidoyat qilur edik.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,48]}]}

{"text":"69. Kim Allohga va Rasulga itoat qilsa, bas, \nana o`shalar Alloh ne'mat bergan nabiylar, siddiqlar, shahidlar va solihlar bilan birgadirlar. Va ular qanday ham yaxshi rafiq (hamroh)lardir!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,188]}]}

{"text":"70. Bu — Allohdan bo`lgan fazldir va bilguvchilikda Allohning O`zi kifoya qilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,80]}]}

{"text":"71. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! \nO`zingizni hushyor tuting va guruh-guruh bo`lib \nqo`zg`aling yoki to`p holingizda qo`zg`aling!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,123]}]}

{"text":"72. Albatta, ichingizda ortda qoladiganlar ham bor. Agar sizga musiybat yetsa, u: «Alloh O`zi menga\n ne'mat berdi, yaxshiyamki, ular bilan birga hozir \nbo`lmaganim», deydi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,172]}]}

{"text":"73. Agar sizga Allohdan fazl yetsa, 
xuddi siz bilan uning orasida do`stlik bo`lmagandek, 
«Qani endi, men ham ular bilan bo`lganimda, 
ulug` zafar qozonar edim», deydi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,169]}]}

{"text":"74. Oxirat uchun bu dunyo hayotini sotadiganlar Allohning yo`lida jang qilsinlar. Kim Allohning yo`lida jang qilib o`ldirilsa yoki g`olib kelsa, Biz unga, albatta, ulug` ajrni berurmiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,185]}]}

{"text":"75. Nima uchun Allohning yo`lida va: «Ey Robbimiz, \nbizni ahli zolim shahardan chiqargin, bizga O`z tomoningdan do`st ato qilgin va O`z tomoningdan nusratchi ato qilgin» deyayotgan zaifhol erkagu ayol va bolalar yo`lida jang qilmaysizlar?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,239]}]}

{"text":"76. Iymon keltirganlar Allohning yo`lida jang qilurlar. Kufr keltirganlar tog`utning yo`lida jang qilurlar. \nBas, shaytonning do`stlariga qarshi jang qiling. \nAlbatta, shaytonning hiylasi zaifdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,196]}]}

{"text":"77. Qo`lingizni tiying, namoz o`qib, zakot bering, 
deb aytilgan kimsalarni ko`rmaysanmi?! Ularga urush farz qilinganda, birdan, bir guruhlari odamlardan 
xuddi Allohdan qo`rqqandek yoki undan ham 
qattiqroq qo`rqishmoqda. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,223]}]}

{"text":"Va: «Ey Robbimiz, bizga urushni nega farz qilding, \nbiroz ortga surib tursang bo`lmasmidi?!» demoqdalar. «Dunyoning matohi oz, oxirat esa, taqvo qilganlarga yaxshidir. Va qilchalik zulm qilinmassizlar», deb ayt.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,211]}]}

{"text":"78. Qayerda bo`lsangiz ham, hattoki mustahkam \nqal'alarda bo`lsangiz ham, o`lim sizni topadir. \nAgar ularga yaxshilik yetsa, bu Allohdan, derlar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,146]}]}

{"text":"Yomonlik yetganda esa, bu sendan, derlar. \n«Hammasi Allohdan», deb ayt! Anavi qavmlarga \nnima bo`ldiki, gapni tushunay demaslar?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,129]}]}

{"text":"79. Senga yetgan yaxshilik Allohdandir. \nVa senga yetgan yomonlik nafsingdandir. \nBiz seni odamlarga Payg`ambar qilib yubordik. Shohidlikka Allohning O`zi kifoya qilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,168]}]}

{"text":"80. Kim Payg`ambarga itoat qilsa, \nAllohga itoat qilgan bo`lur. Kim yuz o`girsa, \n Biz seni ularga qo`riqchi qilib yuborganimiz yo`q.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,133]}]}

{"text":"81. Ular, itoat, derlar. Huzuringdan chiqqach esa, \nbir toifalari aytganingdan boshqaga xufyona til biriktirarlar. Alloh xufyona til biriktirgan narsalarini yozib qo`yadir. Bas, ulardan yuz o`gir va Allohga tavakkal qil. Vakillikka Allohning O`zi kifoya qilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,260]}]}

{"text":"82. Qur'onni tadabbur etib ko`rmaydilarmi?! \nAgar u Allohdan boshqaning huzuridan bo`lganida, undan ko`p ixtiloflar topar edilar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,129]}]}

{"text":"83. Qachonki ularga eminlik yoki haq to`g`risida \nbir ish — xabar yetsa, uni taraturlar. Agar uni \nPayg`ambarga va o`zlaridan bo`lgan ishboshilarga havola qilganlarida edi, ulardan ish negizini biladiganlari uni anglab yetar edilar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,233]}]}

{"text":"Allohning fazli va marhamati bo`lmaganda, ozginangizdan boshqangiz shaytonga \nergashib ketar edingiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,101]}]}

{"text":"84. Allohning yo`lida jang qil! O`zingdan boshqadan mas'ul qilinmassan. Mo`minlarni qiziqtir. Shoyadki, \nAlloh kufr keltirganlarning shiddatini daf' qilsa. \nAlloh shiddati qattiq va azobi ortiq Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,201]}]}

{"text":"85. Kim yaxshi shafoat qilsa, undan o`z nasibasi bo`lur. Kim yomon shafoat qilsa, undan o`z nasibasi bo`lur. Alloh har bir narsaning bahosini beruvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,158]}]}

{"text":"86. Qachonki sizga bir salomlashish ila salom berilsa, siz undan ko`ra yaxshiroq alik oling yoki xuddi o`zidek javob bering. Albatta, Alloh har bir narsaning hisobini oluvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,182]}]}

{"text":"87. Allohdan o`zga ibodatga sazovor zot yo`q. 
U sizlarni qoim bo`lishida hech shubha yo`q 
qiyomat kuni albatta jamlaydir. 
Kim Allohdan ko`ra rostgo`yroq?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,157]}]}

{"text":"88. Sizga nima bo`ldiki, munofiqlar haqida ikkiga 
bo`linasizlar?! Holbuki, Alloh ularni rasvo qilib qo`ydi-ku. Alloh adashtirgan kimsalarni hidoyat qilmoqchi 
bo`lasizlarmi?! Alloh kimni adashtirgan bo`lsa, 
unga yo`l topa olmassan.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,233]}]}

{"text":"89. Ular siz ham xuddi o`zlaridek kofir bo`lib, ularga tenglashishingizni xohlarlar. Toki Alloh yo`lida hijrat qilmagunlaricha, ulardan do`st tutmang. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,151]}]}

{"text":"Agar yuz o`girib ketsalar, bas, ularni tuting va \nqayerda topsangiz, o`ldiring. Ulardan do`st ham, yordamchi ham tutmang.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,121]}]}

{"text":"90. Magar siz bilan orasida ahdnoma bor qavmga yetib borsalar yoki sizlar bilan ham, o`z qavmlari bilan ham urushish ko`ngillariga sig`masdan huzuringizga kelsalar, mayli. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,172]}]}

{"text":"Alloh xohlaganida, ularni sizdan ustun qilib qo`yardi va ular sizlarga qarshi urush qilardilar. Agar sizdan chetlansalar va siz bilan urushmasdan, tinchlikni taklif qilsalar, Alloh sizlarga ularning ziddiga yo`l bermas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,219]}]}

{"text":"91. Sizdan ham, o`z qavmlaridan ham omonda bo`lishni xohlaydigan, fitnaga qaytarilgan chog`larida unga sho`ng`iydigan boshqa birovlarni ham ko`rasizlar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,153]}]}

{"text":"Agar sizdan chetlanmasalar, sizga tinchlikni taklif qilmasalar va qo`llarini tiymasalar, bas, ularni tuting \nva qayerda topsangiz, o`ldiring. Ana o`shandaylar ustidan sizga ochiq haq berdik. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,191]}]}

{"text":"92. Mo`min mo`minni o`ldirmas. Magar bilmasdan qilishi mumkin. Kimki mo`minni bilmasdan o`ldirib \nqo`ysa, bas, unga mo`min qulni ozod qilish va \n(o`lganning) ahli kechirmasalar, xun berish vojib bo`lur. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,203]}]}

{"text":"Agar u sizga dushman qavmdan bo`lib, \no`zi mo`min bo`lsa, mo`min qulni ozod qilish vojib \nbo`lur. Agar u siz bilan orasida ahdnomasi bor qavmdan bo`lsa, ahliga beriladigan xun va mo`min qulni ozod qilish vojib bo`lur. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,218]}]}

{"text":"Kim topmasa, Allohga tavba uchun ketma-ket ikki oy ro`za tutish vojib bo`lur. Alloh biluvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,112]}]}

{"text":"93. Kim bir mo`minni qasdan o`ldirsa, 
uning jazosi jahannamdir. Unda abadiy qolur. 
Unga Allohning g`azabi va la'nati yog`ilur. 
Va Alloh unga ulkan azobni tayyorlagandir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,172]}]}

{"text":"94. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Allohning yo`lida \njihodga chiqsangiz, aniqlab olinglar va sizga salom bergan kimsaga, mo`min emassan, demanglar. \nBu dunyo hayotining o`tkinchi o`ljasini istaysizlar, Allohning huzurida esa, ko`plab o`ljalar bor. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,242]}]}

{"text":"Avvallari siz ham shunday edingiz, \nAlloh sizga ne'mat berdi. Bas, aniqlab oling. \nAlbatta, Alloh nima qilayotganingizdan xabardordir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,134]}]}

{"text":"95. Mo`minlardan beshikast bo`la turib o`tirib qolganlari bilan Allohning yo`lida mollari va jonlari ila jihod qiluvchilari barobar bo`lmaslar. \nAlloh mollari va jonlari bilan jiddu jahd qiluvchilarning darajasini o`tirib qoluvchilardan afzal qildi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,249]}]}

{"text":" Alloh hammaga yaxshilikni va'da qilgan. \nAlloh mujohidlarni o`tirib qoluvchilardan \nulug` ajr ila afzal qilgan.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,112]}]}

{"text":"96. O`zidan bo`lgan darajalar ila, \nmag`firat va rahmat ila (afzal qilgan). \nVa Alloh mag`firat qiluvchi va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,123]}]}

{"text":"97. O`ziga zulm qiluvchi holida joni olinayotganlarga farishtalar: «Nima qilayotgan edinglar?» derlar. \nUlar: «Er yuzida bechora edik», derlar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,144]}]}

{"text":"«Allohning yeri keng edi-ku, 
hijrat qilsangiz bo`lmasmidi?!» derlar. 
Ana o`shalarning joyi jahannamdir. 
U qanday ham yomon joy!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,130]}]}

{"text":"98. Faqat erkaklar, ayollar va bolalardan iborat, biron choraga qodir bo`lmagan, yo`lni topa olmagan bechoralargina bundan mustasno.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,132]}]}

{"text":"99. Ana o`shalar, shoyadki, Alloh ularni afv etsa. \nZotan, Alloh afv etuvchi va mag`firat qiluvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,106]}]}

{"text":"100. Kim Allohning yo`lida hijrat qilsa, yer yuzida \nko`pgina panohgohlar va kengchilik topadir. Kim uyidan Alloh va Rasulga hijrat qilib chiqsa-yu, so`ngra unga o`lim yetsa, albatta, uning ajri Alloh zimmasiga tushadir. Va Alloh mag`firat qiluvchi va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,267]}]}

{"text":"101. Yer yuzida javlon urganingizda, \nkufr keltirganlar sizga fitna qilishidan xavf qilsangiz, namozni qasr qilib ado etmog`ingizda gunoh yo`qdir. \nAlbatta, kofirlar sizga ochiq dushmandirlar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,192]}]}

{"text":"102. Ular ichida bo`lsang-u, namoz ado 
qilmoqchi bo`lsang, ulardan bir toifasi sen bilan tursin va silohlarini o`zlari bilan olsinlar. Sajda qilganlaridan keyin orqangizga o`tsinlar. Namoz o`qimagan 
boshqa toifa kelib, sen bilan namoz o`qisin. 
Ehtiyot bo`lib, silohlarini o`zlari bilan olsinlar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,299]}]}

{"text":"Silohlaringiz va matohlaringizdan g`ofil bo`lsangiz, kufr keltirganlar ustingizdan birdan hamla qilishni istarlar. Yomg`irdan ozor yetsa yoki bemor bo`lsangiz, silohlaringizni qo`ymog`ingizda gunoh yo`qdir. \nHushyor bo`linglar! Albatta, Alloh kofirlarga xorlovchi azob tayyorlagandir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,284]}]}

{"text":"103. Namozni ado etganingizdan so`ng, Allohni turgan, o`tirgan va yonboshlagan holingizda eslang. \nXotirjam bo`lganingizda namozni to`liq ado eting. Albatta, namoz mo`minlarga vaqtida farz qilingandir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,201]}]}

{"text":"104. U qavmni quvishda bo`sh kelmang. Agar alam chekayotgan bo`lsangiz, ular ham siz alam chekayotganingizdek alam chekmoqdalar. \nSiz esa, Allohdan ular umid qilmagan narsani umid qilmoqdasiz. Alloh biluvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,227]}]}

{"text":"105. Albatta, Biz senga kitobni haq ila odamlar orasida senga Alloh ko`rsatganicha hukm qilishing uchun tushirdik. Sen xoinlarning yonini oluvchi bo`lma!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,153]}]}

{"text":"106. Allohga istig`for ayt! \nAlbatta, Alloh mag`firatli va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,74]}]}

{"text":"107. O`z jonlariga xiyonat qiladiganlarni mudofaa qilma. Albatta, Alloh xiyonatchi va gunohkor bo`lgan kimsani xush ko`rmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,124]}]}

{"text":"108. Odamlardan yashirarlar va Allohdan yashira olmaslar. Holbuki, U O`zi rozi bo`lmaydigan gapni xufyona kelishayotganlarida ham ular ila birgadir. Va Alloh ular qilayotgan amallarni ihota qiluvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,206]}]}

{"text":"109. Hoy, sizlar! Bu hayoti dunyoda ularning yonini oldingiz. Qiyomat kunida Alloh oldida ularning yonini kim oladir yoki kim ularga vakil bo`ladir?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,149]}]}

{"text":"110. Kim yomonlik qilsa yoki o`ziga zulm etsa, \nso`ngra Allohga istig`for aytsa, Allohni mag`firatli \nva rahimli Zot topadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,125]}]}

{"text":"111. Kim gunoh qilsa, uni faqatgina o`z zarariga qiladir. Va Alloh biluvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,95]}]}

{"text":"112. Kim xato yoki gunoh qilsa-yu, \nso`ngra uni beaybga ag`darsa, shubhasiz, \nbo`hton va ochiq gunohni o`z bo`yniga olibdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,124]}]}

{"text":"113. Agar senga Allohning fazli va rahmati \nbo`lmaganida, ulardan bir toifasi seni adashtirishga uringan edilar. Ular faqat o`zlarini adashtiradilar, xolos. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,157]}]}

{"text":"Senga hech zarar yetkaza olmaslar. Alloh senga kitobni va hikmatni tushirdi hamda bilmagan narsangni bildirdi. Va senga Allohning fazli ulug` bo`ldi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,149]}]}

{"text":"114. Ularning ko`pgina maxfiy suhbatlarida \nyaxshilik yo`q, magar kim sadaqaga, yaxshilikka va odamlar orasida islohga amr qilsagina, yaxshilik bor. Kim o`sha ishni Allohning roziligi uchun qilsa, \nalbatta, unga ulug` ajr berurmiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,231]}]}

{"text":"115. Kim o`ziga hidoyat ravshan bo`lgandan keyin \nPayg`ambarga xilof qilsa va mo`minlarning yo`lidan boshqa yo`lga yursa, ketgan tomonga qo`yib qo`yamiz va jahannamga kiritamiz. U qandoq ham yomon joy!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,201]}]}

{"text":"116. Albatta, Alloh O`ziga shirk keltirilishini kechirmas. Undan boshqani, kimni xohlasa, kechirur. Kim Allohga shirk keltirsa, shubhasiz, qattiq adashgan bo`lur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,162]}]}

{"text":"117. Ular Undan boshqa faqat ayol sanamlarga ibodat qilurlar va faqat bebosh shaytonga ibodat qilurlar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,103]}]}

{"text":"118. Alloh uni la'natladi. U esa: «Qasamki, bandalaringdan ma'lum nasibani olaman.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,82]}]}

{"text":"119. Ularni adashtiraman, xomxayollariga solaman, ularga amr qilsam, chorvalarning quloqlarini kesarlar va ularga amr qilsam, Allohning yaratganini \no`zgartirarlar», dedi. Kimki Allohni qo`yib shaytonni \ndo`st tutsa, batahqiq, ochiq-oydin ziyonga uchraydir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,257]}]}

{"text":"120. U ularga va'da berur va xomxayollarga solur. Shayton ularga g`ururdan boshqa narsani va'da qilmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,103]}]}

{"text":"121. Ana o`shalarning joylari jahannamdir. \nVa undan qutulish yo`lini topa olmaslar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,84]}]}

{"text":"122. Iymon keltirib, yaxshi amallarni qilganlarni ostidan anhorlar oqib turgan jannatlarga kiriturmiz. Unda abadiy — bardavom qolurlar. Allohning va'dasi haqdir. Allohdan rostgo`yroq zot bormi?","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,193]}]}

{"text":"123. Sizlarning xomxayolingizcha ham emas, ahli kitoblarning xomxayolicha ham emas. Kim yomonlik qilsa, uning jazosini tortadir. Va o`ziga Allohdan o`zga do`st ham, yordamchi ham topa olmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,190]}]}

{"text":"124. Erkakmi, ayolmi — kim mo`min bo`lgan holda yaxshiliklar qilsa, ana o`shalar jannatga kirurlar va ularga qilcha ham zulm qilinmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,134]}]}

{"text":"125. Yaxshilik qiluvchi bo`lgan holida yuzini Allohga taslim qilgan va Ibrohimning to`g`ri diniga ergashgan kimsaning dinidan ham yaxshiroq din bormi? \nVa Alloh Ibrohimni do`st tutgan edi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,188]}]}

{"text":"126. Osmonlaru yerdagi narsalar Allohga xosdir va Alloh har bir narsani ihota qilgan Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,92]}]}

{"text":"127. Sendan ayollar haqida fatvo so`rarlar. «Alloh sizga ular haqida va kitobda tilovat qilinadigan, siz ularga tayin qilingan narsani bermay nikohiga rag`bat qilganingiz ayollar haqida, zaifhol bolalar haqida va yetimlarga adolat qilmog`ingiz haqida fatvo beradir», deb ayt. \nAlloh qilgan har bir yaxshiligingizni biluvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,331]}]}

{"text":"128. Agar ayol kishi o`z eridan nafrat va yuz o`girish sodir bo`lishidan qo`rqsa, ikkovlari o`zaro sulhga kelishishlarida gunoh yo`q. Sulh yaxshidir. Nafslar qizg`anishga hozirdir. Agar yaxshilik va taqvo qilsangiz, albatta, \nAlloh nima qilayotganingizdan xabardor Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,272]}]}

{"text":"129. Agar rosa harakat qilsangiz ham, xotinlar o`rtasida adolatli bo`la olmassizlar. Bir yo`la moyil bo`lib ketib, 
(ba'zisini) muallaqqa o`xshatib qo`ymang. 
Agar isloh va taqvo qilsangiz, albatta, 
Alloh mag`firatli va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,236]}]}

{"text":"130. Agar ajrashsalar, Alloh O`z fazlidan har birini behojat qilur. Alloh fazli keng va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,104]}]}

{"text":"131. Osmonlaru yerdagi narsalar Allohnikidir. \nBatahqiq, Biz sizdan oldin kitob berilganlarga ham, sizga ham: «Allohga taqvo qilinglar», deb vasiyat qildik. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,157]}]}

{"text":"Agar kufr keltirsangiz, albatta, \nosmonlaru yerdagi narsalar Allohnikidir. \nVa Alloh behojat va maqtalgan Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,113]}]}

{"text":"132. Osmonlaru yerdagi narsalar Allohnikidir. \nVakil bo`lishga Alloh kifoyadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,79]}]}

{"text":"133. Agar U Zot xohlasa, ey odamlar, \nsizlarni ketkazib, boshqalarni keltirur. \nVa Alloh bunga qodir bo`lgan Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,116]}]}

{"text":"134. Kim bu dunyo savobini istasa, bilsinki, Allohning huzurida ham bu dunyoning, ham u dunyoning savobi bordir. Va Alloh eshituvchi va ko`ruvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,153]}]}

{"text":"135. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! 
Adolat ila turing hamda agar o`zingiz, 
ota-onangiz va qarindoshlaringiz ziddiga bo`lsa ham, 
Alloh uchun to`g`ri guvohlik beruvchi bo`ling. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,171]}]}

{"text":"Agar u boy bo`lsa ham, kambag`al bo`lsa ham, 
Alloh unga yaqinroqdir. Havoyi nafsga ergashib, adolatsizlik qilmang. Agar tilingizni bursangiz 
yoki yuz o`girib ketsangiz, albatta, 
Alloh nima qilayotganingizdan xabardordir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,223]}]}

{"text":"136. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Allohga, \nUning Rasuliga, U O`z Rasuliga tushirgan kitobga va bundan oldin tushirgan kitobga iymon keltiring. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,139]}]}

{"text":"Kim Allohga, Uning farishtalariga, kitoblariga, \nPayg`ambarlariga va oxirat kuniga kufr keltirsa, batahqiq, qattiq adashgan bo`ladi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,132]}]}

{"text":"137. Albatta, iymon keltirganlaridan keyin kufr keltirganlar, so`ngra iymon keltirib yana kufrga ketgan va kufrida ziyoda bo`lganlarni Alloh mag`firat qilmas va to`g`ri yo`lga hidoyat etmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,190]}]}

{"text":"138. Munofiqlarga ularga albatta alamli \nazob bo`lishining bashoratini ber.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,75]}]}

{"text":"139. Ular mo`minlarni qo`yib, kofirlarni do`st tutadiganlardir. Ularning oldida izzat, kuch-qudrat izlaydilarmi? Albatta, izzat, kuch-qudratning barchasi Allohning huzuridadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,176]}]}

{"text":"140. Batahqiq, sizlarga kitobda: \n«Allohning oyatlariga kufr keltirilgan va ularni istehzo qilingan chog`da, boshqa gapga o`tmagunlaricha, ular bilan o`tirmanglar», deb tushirdi. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,179]}]}

{"text":"Agar o`tirsangiz, siz ham ularga o`xshashsiz. \nAlbatta, Alloh munofiq va kofirlarning hammasini jahannamda jamlovchidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,120]}]}

{"text":"141. Ular sizlarni kuzatib tururlar. Sizlarga Alloh tomonidan fath bo`lsa: «Sizlar bilan birga emasmidik?!» derlar. Agar kofirlarga nasiba bo`lsa: «Sizlarga ustun kelib, mo`minlardan himoya qilmadikmi?» derlar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,211]}]}

{"text":"Alloh qiyomat kuni ular orasida hukm qilur. \nAlloh hargiz kofirlarga mo`minlar ustidan yo`l bermas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,99]}]}

{"text":"142. Albatta, munofiqlar Allohni aldamoqchi bo`lurlar. Holbuki, Alloh ularni «aldovchi»dir. Agar namozga tursalar, dangasalik bilan, xo`jako`rsinga tururlar va Allohni kamdan-kam zikr qilurlar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,193]}]}

{"text":"143. Ular orada sarsondirlar. 
Na anavilarga qo`shila oladirlar va na manavilarga 
qo`shila oladirlar. Alloh kimni yo`ldan adashtirsa, 
hargiz unga yo`l topa olmassan.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,167]}]}

{"text":"144. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Mo`minlarni qo`yib, kofirlarni do`st tutmang. Allohning huzurida o`z ziddingizga ochiq hujjat qilishni xohlaysizmi?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,145]}]}

{"text":"145. Albatta, munofiqlar do`zaxning eng ostki qavatidadirlar va hargiz ularga bir yordamchini \ntopa olmassan.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,109]}]}

{"text":"146. Magar tavba qilib, solih amallar qilgan, \nAllohni mahkam ushlagan va Alloh uchun dinga ixlos qo`yganlar — ana o`shalar mo`minlar ila birgadirlar. Alloh, albatta, mo`minlarga ulug` ajr berur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,195]}]}

{"text":"147. Agar shukr qilsangiz va iymon keltirsangiz, \nAlloh sizni azoblab nima qiladir?! Alloh Shakur(oz \namal uchun ko`p savob beruvchi) va biluvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,153]}]}

{"text":"148. Alloh yomon gapni oshkor qilishni xush ko`rmas. Magar mazlumdan bo`lsa, mayli. \nAlloh eshituvchi va biluvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,121]}]}

{"text":"149. Agar yaxshilikni oshkora yoki maxfiy \nqilsangiz yoki yomonlikni afv etsangiz, albatta, \nAlloh afvli va qodir Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,121]}]}

{"text":"150. Albatta, Allohga va Uning Payg`ambarlariga kufr keltiradiganlar va Alloh ila Payg`ambarlari orasida ayrimchilikni iroda qiladiganlar hamda ba'zilariga iymon va ba'zilariga kufr keltiramiz, deb ana o`shanday ora yo`lni tutishni xohlaydiganlar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,247]}]}

{"text":"151. Ana o`shalar, haqiqiy kofirlardir. \nVa kofirlarga xorlovchi azobni tayyorlab qo`yganmiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,93]}]}

{"text":"152. Allohga va Uning Payg`ambarlariga iymon keltirganlarga va ularning birortasini ham ayirmaganlarga — ana o`shalarga ajrlarini albatta berurmiz. Va Alloh mag`firatli va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,187]}]}

{"text":"153. Ahli kitoblar sendan ularga 
osmondan kitob tushirib berishingni so`rarlar. 
Musodan bundan ham katta narsani so`raganlar — 
«Bizga Allohni oshkora ko`rsat», deganlar. 
Bas, zulmlari tufayli ularni chaqmoq urdi. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,217]}]}

{"text":"So`ngra, ularga ochiq-oydin bayonotlar kelganidan keyin buzoqni (xudo qilib) oldilar. Bas, Biz buni ham \nafv qildik va Musoga ochiq-oydin sulton berdik.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,152]}]}

{"text":"154. Va ahdnomalariga muvofiq, ustilariga \nTurni ko`tardik va ularga: «Eshikdan egilib kiringlar» hamda «Shanba kuni haddingizdan oshmang», dedik. Va ulardan mustahkam ahdnoma oldik.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,182]}]}

{"text":"155. Ahdnomalarini buzganlari, Allohning oyatlariga kufr keltirganlari, Payg`ambarlarni nohaqdan \no`ldirganlari, «qalblarimiz berk» deganlari uchun. Yo`q! Balki, kufrlari sababli Alloh qalblariga muhr bosgan, ozginalaridan boshqasi iymon keltirmaslar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,251]}]}

{"text":"156. «Va kufrlari, Maryamga qarshi ulkan bo`hton aytganlari uchun».","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,67]}]}

{"text":"157. «Biz Allohning Rasuli Masiyh Iyso ibn Maryamni 
o`ldirdik», deganlari uchun (ularni la'natladik). 
Holbuki, uni o`ldirmadilar ham, osmadilar ham, 
lekin ularga shunday tuyuldi. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,182]}]}

{"text":"U haqida ixtilofga tushganlar uning o`limidan 
shak-shubhadadirlar. U to`g`risida ularning 
bilimlari yo`q, magar gumonga ergasharlar. 
Uni o`ldirmaganlari aniqdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,164]}]}

{"text":"158. Balki, uni Alloh O`ziga ko`tardi. \nAlloh aziyz va hakiym bo`lgan Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,77]}]}

{"text":"159. Hech bir ahli kitob yo`qki, \nunga o`limidan oldin iymon keltirmasa. \nQiyomat kuni esa, u ularning ziddiga guvoh bo`lur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,124]}]}

{"text":"160. Yahudiy bo`lganlarga, ularning zulmi, \nAllohning yo`lidan ko`p to`sganlari uchun, \no`zlariga halol qilingan narsani harom qildik.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,134]}]}

{"text":"161. Va qaytarilgan bo`lsalar ham, \nribo olganliklari va odamlarning mollarini botil yo`l bilan yeganlari uchun. Va ularning kofirlari uchun alamli azobni tayyorlab qo`ydik.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,173]}]}

{"text":"162. Lekin, ulardan ilmda mustahkam bo`lganlari va \nmo`minlari senga nozil bo`lgan narsaga va sendan oldin nozil bo`lgan narsaga iymon keltirurlar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,148]}]}

{"text":"Xususan, namozni qoim qiluvchilar, zakot beruvchilar, Allohga va oxirat kuniga iymon keltiruvchilar ham. \nAna o`shalarga albatta ulug` ajr berurmiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,148]}]}

{"text":"163. Biz senga xuddi Nuh va undan keyingi \nPayg`ambarlarga vahiy yuborganimizdek \nvahiy yubordik. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,98]}]}

{"text":"Biz Ibrohim, Ismoil, Is'hoq, Ya'qub, asbot, Iyso, Ayyub, Yunus, Horun va Sulaymonga vahiy yubordik. \nDovudga esa Zaburni berdik.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,128]}]}

{"text":"164. Va Biz senga bundan oldin qissalarini aytib bergan va qissalarini aytib bermagan Payg`ambarlarni yubordik. Va Alloh Muso ila o`ziga xos gaplashdi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,151]}]}

{"text":"165. Bashorat beruvchi va ogohlantiruvchi \nPayg`ambarlarni Alloh huzurida odamlarga \nPayg`ambarlardan so`ng hujjat bo`lmasligi uchun yubordik. Va Alloh aziyz va hakiym bo`lgan Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,183]}]}

{"text":"166. Lekin Alloh senga nozil qilgan narsasi ila guvohlik beradir. Uni O`z ilmi ila nozil qildi. Farishtalar ham guvohlik berurlar. Guvohlikka Allohning O`zi kifoya qilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,170]}]}

{"text":"167. Kufr keltirgan va Allohning yo`lidan to`sganlar, batahqiq, qattiq adashgandirlar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,86]}]}

{"text":"168. Albatta, kufr keltirganlar va zulm qilganlarni Alloh zinhor mag`firat qilmas va yo`lga hidoyat ham qilmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,111]}]}

{"text":"169. Magar jahannam yo`liga (hidoyat qilur) va unda abadiy qolurlar. Bu, Alloh uchun osondir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,93]}]}

{"text":"170. Ey odamlar! Batahqiq, sizlarga Robbingizdan haq ila Payg`ambar keldi. Bas, iymon keltiring, o`zingizga yaxshi bo`ladir. Agar kufr keltirsangiz, albatta, osmonlaru yerdagi narsalar Allohnikidir. \nVa Alloh biluvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,237]}]}

{"text":"171. Ey, ahli kitoblar! Diningizda haddan oshmang va Alloh haqida haqdan boshqani aytmang. 
Albatta, Masiyh Iyso ibn Maryam Allohning 
Payg`ambari, Maryamga ilqo qilgan kalimasi va 
Undan bo`lgan ruhdir. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,204]}]}

{"text":"Bas, Allohga va Uning Payg`ambarlariga iymon keltiring. Uni uchta demang. To`xtang, o`zingizga yaxshi bo`ladi. Albatta, Alloh yagona ilohdir, o`zga emas. \nU O`zining bolasi bo`lishidan pok bo`ldi. \nOsmonlardagi narsalar va yerdagi narsalar Unikidir. Vakillikka Allohning O`zi kifoya qilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,289]}]}

{"text":"172. Masiyh ham, muqarrab farishtalar ham \nAllohga banda bo`lishdan zinhor bosh tortmaslar. \nKim Uning ibodatidan bosh tortsa va mutakabbirlik qilsa, ularning hammasini O`ziga to`plar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,184]}]}

{"text":"173. Iymon keltirib, yaxshi amallarni qilganlarni esa, ajrlarini to`liq qilib berur va O`z fazlidan ziyoda ham qilur. Ammo, or qilib kibrga ketganlarni alamli azob bilan azoblar va ular o`zlari uchun Allohdan o`zga \ndo`st ham, yordamchi ham topmaslar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,251]}]}

{"text":"174. Ey odamlar! Sizga Robbingizdan burhon keldi va sizga aniq nurni nozil qildik.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,82]}]}

{"text":"175. Allohga iymon keltirgan va 
Uni mahkam tutganlarni, shubhasiz, 
O`zidan bo`lgan rahmatga va fazlga kiritur va 
ularni unga — to`g`ri yo`lga hidoyat qilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,159]}]}

{"text":"176. Sendan fatvo so`rarlar. «Alloh sizga kalola haqida fatvo berur», deb ayt. Agar bir odam o`lsa-yu, \nuning bolasi bo`lmasa, singlisi bo`lsa, unga marhumdan qolganning yarmi berilur. Agar singilning bolasi bo`lmasa, u hamma merosni olur. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,240]}]}

{"text":"Agar singil ikkita bo`lsa, ular marhumdan qolganning uchdan ikkisini olurlar. Agar (merosxo`rlar) erkak-ayol birodarlar bo`lsalar, bir erkak ikki ayol hissasi asosida olurlar. Adashmasligingiz uchun Alloh bayon qilmoqda. Alloh har bir narsani biluvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/CapCut/User Data/Cache/effect/7202912523383738881/62f9677bff07407d954efbb810d8273e/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":"7202912523383738881"},"size":8,"range":[0,259]}]}
